output.sentences: We stopped to relax and watch the koi in the pond.
The flowers around the pond were beautiful.
We noticed several different kinds of bugs on the plant and wondered which ones were bad.
We laughed while we took pictures and hung around the park for a bit.
There was a ride at the fair we saw as we headed back into town.
